item.title: Prometheon
item.description: INTRODUCTION If you’ve fiddled around with LLM jailbreaking, you’ve definitely seen this format of game before. The AI has a secret that they’ve been instructed to never divulge, and our task is to get them to divulge it. Fun! 🎉 This challenge was fairly easy. It’s good to know a few prompting tricks. Thankfully, even some pretty basic tricks worked fine - no need to use every trick all at once.
